decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the board and maintain an advantage over the opponent through a combination of removal spells, efficient creatures, and planeswalkers. By using cards like Crackling Doom, Lightning Strike, and Butcher of the Horde, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with cards like Goblin Rabblemaster and Seeker of the Way. Utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Sorin, Solemn Visitor and Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker, the deck also has the ability to generate card advantage and close out games efficiently.

This Abzan Aggro deck focuses on using a combination of powerful creatures like Siege Rhino and Courser of Kruphix, along with removal spells like Hero's Downfall and Abzan Charm to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck also has access to hand disruption with Thoughseize and versatile planeswalkers like Sorin, Solemn Visitor and Elspeth, Sun's Champion. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirement, with a mix of dual lands and mana-fixing cards. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and control the game until victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board while ramping up mana with green cards. By utilizing cards like Sylvan Caryatid and Elvish Mystic to ramp up mana quickly, the deck aims to play powerful creatures like Hornet Queen and Polukranos, World Eater. The addition of Whip of Erebos provides recursion and lifegain, while cards like Doomwake Giant and See the Unwritten help control the board and find key creatures. The deck also includes Eidolon of Blossoms for card draw and Courser of Kruphix for additional mana ramp and lifegain.

This deck revolves around the combo of Jeskai Ascendancy and Retraction Helix. The key concept is to generate a large number of mana dorks, such as Sylvan Caryatid and Rattleclaw Mystic, and use them to untap artifacts with Retraction Helix. This allows you to trigger the untap ability of Jeskai Ascendancy multiple times, potentially creating an infinite loop where you can loot through your deck, generate mana, and mill your opponent with Altar of the Brood. The deck also includes card draw and filtering spells like Commune with the Gods and Tormenting Voice, as well as counterspells with Dig Through Time.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a combination of efficient creatures and removal spells. It utilizes cards like Siege Rhino and Courser of Kruphix for early board presence, while also including powerful finishers like Hornet Queen and Wingmate Roc. The deck also features cards like Pharika, God of Affliction and Whip of Erebos for additional value and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents with early threats while maintaining a strong board presence throughout the game.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive threats like Siege Rhino and Anafenza, the Foremost to pressure the opponent's life total. It also utilizes cards like Whip of Erebos and Doomwake Giant to gain life and control the board, while also providing value with creatures like Hornet Queen and Reclamation Sage. The deck is designed to have a fast and powerful start, overwhelming the opponent with a mix of efficient creatures and removal spells to maintain board control and close out the game quickly.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana through mana dorks and fixing with lands, allowing it to consistently play powerful threats such as Siege Rhino and Soul of Theros. It also utilizes graveyard synergy with cards like Sidisi, Brood Tyrant and Commune with the Gods to maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of removal spells like Murderous Cut and powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Mentor of Heroes adds versatility and resilience to the aggressive strategy of the deck.

The deck focuses on playing aggressively with powerful creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By ramping up mana with cards like Elvish Mystic and Rattleclaw Mystic, the deck can get ahead early and maintain pressure with efficient threats like Savage Knuckleblade and Stormbreath Dragon. Crater's Claws and Lightning Strike provide reach to finish off opponents or clear blockers, while counterspells like Stubborn Denial can protect the deck's key threats. The deck aims to apply pressure and close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this Abzan Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient and powerful creatures like Anafenza, Siege Rhino, and Wingmate Roc, supported by disruption spells like Thoughtseize and removal like Hero's Downfall and Bile Blight. The deck also includes some lifegain and card draw options to help maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. With a balanced mix of threats and answers, this deck aims to quickly apply pressure and control the game to secure victories in a 1 vs 1 Standard format.

The deck focuses on aggressive tactics using a combination of powerful creatures like Anafenza, Siege Rhino, and Hornet Queen, along with support cards like Whip of Erebos for lifelink and resilience. The deck also includes removal spells like Hero's Downfall and Utter End to control the board and keep the pressure on the opponent. The addition of cards like Courser of Kruphix and Eidolon of Blossoms provides card advantage and consistency, while See the Unwritten allows for powerful creature plays. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of threats and disruption.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with powerful creatures like Siege Rhino, Wingmate Roc, Anafenza, and Fleecemane Lion. It also includes strong removal spells like Hero's Downfall, Abzan Charm, and Bile Blight to control the board. The deck also features hand disruption with Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Utilizing the efficient mana base and diverse card pool of the Abzan colors, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures with strong abilities and versatile removal options.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using a mix of powerful creatures like Wingmate Roc, Siege Rhino, and Anafenza, the Foremost, along with disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Hero's Downfall to control the opponent's board. The mana base is built to ensure consistent access to different colors of mana, with a mix of dual lands and mana-fixing cards like Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain control of the game through a combination of powerful creatures and removal spells.

The main idea of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and fast burn spells. By efficiently using cards like Seeker of the Way and Goblin Rabblemaster to apply early pressure, while also having a strong late game threat in Stormbreath Dragon, this deck aims to deal consistent damage to the opponent and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of removal spells like Lightning Strike and Stoke the Flames helps to clear the way for your creatures to attack and secure victory.

The primary focus of this Mardu Control deck is to maintain control over the battlefield through removal spells and disruptive creatures while generating card advantage with powerful planeswalkers like Elspeth, Sun's Champion and Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker. The deck also utilizes token generation with cards like Hordeling Outburst and Goblin Rabblemaster to create a board presence and pressure the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of burn spells and efficient creatures like Butcher of the Horde to provide additional removal and reach to finish off the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently. With a strong lineup of low mana cost creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Monastery Swiftspear supported by spells like Lightning Strike and Stoke the Flames, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and often. This deck is built for speed and aggression, looking to outpace the opponent and finish the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on playing powerful aggressive creatures like Savage Knuckleblade, Stormbreath Dragon, and Ashcloud Phoenix to quickly pressure the opponent. The deck also includes versatile removal spells like Crater's Claws and Lightning Strike, as well as tempo cards like Temur Charm to control the board. The mana base allows for consistent ramp and fixing, while cards like Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker and Rattleclaw Mystic provide additional mana acceleration. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient threats and close out the game before they can stabilize.
